name: Everything Forever - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: "Everything Forever", designed in 1997 by designer Roberto Lazzeroni, is a sideboard that reinterprets the traditional Tuscan sideboard known as the madia. The innovative design features a top that extends outward at the front, and sinuous sides that connect seamlessly with surrounding furniture. Crafted from solid American walnut with options for glass or wooden doors and multiple drawers, one of which includes a cutlery holder, the sideboard embodies Ceccotti Collezioni's unique and complex design aesthetic.
